faq.title: FAQs
faq.description: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Feel free to contact us.

questions.question: What are the benefits of renting Facebook ad account agencies?
questions.answer: Renting ad accounts provides businesses with access to the expertise and resources of established ad agencies, reducing the learning curve and potential pitfalls associated with self-managed campaigns. It also allows businesses to leverage enterprise-level Business Managers (BM), gain 24/7 Facebook representative support, access the 1000 data-points algorithm, remove ad account restrictions, and maximize their monthly ad account spend.

questions.question: What is the process to get started?
questions.answer: – Please contact us. – We explain the service to you in detail. – You require an ad account. – You Receive Ad Account Within 24h-48h. – You launch your ad

questions.question: Do you work with all types of businesses?
questions.answer: We accept all industries that do not violate the policies of the platforms. We will discuss in detail when we have the opportunity to work with you.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept payment in crypto, specifically USDT, for convenience. Additionally, we also accept payment through Payoneer.

questions.question: If I'm running a product that's not allowed on FB ads and the account gets disabled, will there be additional fees?
questions.answer: As we mentioned before, we don't need to know what product you want to run. You only have to pay 6-10% of the total fee spent, and providing a new ad account and new card is completely free.

questions.question: How can I access my account to run my campaigns after I have deposited the funds?
questions.answer: First, you need to download and register for a Adspower or Gologin account (you can download it from the official Adspower.com or Gologin.com website). Then, you send an email with the account that you registered to us and we will share profiles with you (profiles include an ad account and an account to run it, pages to run and pre-installed pixels). You just need to log in to the profiles that are specifically assigned to you to set up ads and make money.

questions.question: Can you provide more information about the services offered by MDG Agency?
questions.answer: We offer a solution for partners who want to run their products but do not have a healthy FB, GG ads account or page to do so. We accept all products from our partners, including GAMING, CRYPTO, RECRUITMENT, INVESTMENT, and more, and ensure that they will not experience any interruptions while running their ads. We can provide multiple accounts to our partners, and if any account fails, we will replace it immediately to ensure the continuity of our clients' advertising campaigns.

questions.question: How much do I have to pay to use your services?
questions.answer: Our partners will incur a only 10% fee based on total spending (no additional fees will be charged). This means that if you run ads worth $1000, you need to pay an additional 6-10%, totaling $1060 – $1100.

questions.question: If I deposit $500 and have spent about $330 and my account provided by you is locked, what will happen to the remaining balance and how will I know?
questions.answer: Each Facebook account will have its own ad account. Additionally, the ad account we provide you will have an invoice that shows the amount you have spent, so you can easily check if the balance matches. In your case, the remaining balance would be $170 ($500 – $330), which will be transferred to the ad account in the next cycle we provide you. Alternatively, if you no longer want to use our service, we will refund the remaining $170 to you.

questions.question: What is the minimum and maximum amount I can deposit and how much budget can you provide me with?
questions.answer: The minimum deposit fee is $50 – for first-time customers who want to test our product. The minimum deposit fee is $200 – for customers who have used our services before. We can provide a daily budget ranging from $100,000 to $500,000 for you.

questions.question: Assuming you are running ads and your Facebook ads account is disabled, how long will it take for you to be provided with a new account from your side?
questions.answer: We will provide a new account immediately upon receiving notification from you. Our support team is always available with 1-2 people online to assist our partners.

questions.question: Which one should I choose, an agency account or a regular account?
questions.answer: Although we provide both types of accounts: regular and agency accounts. I have a recommendation that if the customer's monthly budget is below $30,000, they should not run ads on an agency account. Reasons: – The fees are expensive, with monthly maintenance fees of around $300-400 and setup fees of $400 per session. – In other words, with a budget below $30,000 per month, regular ad accounts are usually more cost-effective than agency accounts by about $700-$800 in the first month and $400 in the following months. – While agency accounts are undoubtedly stronger than regular accounts, we provide free replacements if the Facebook ads account gets disabled. In summary, the quality is nearly the same. According to my opinion, agency accounts are only suitable for large-scale projects with short running durations, such as ICO campaigns, and require a budget of $10,000 per day or higher.
